docs.title: Welcome to SubN3t
docs.text:
Who am I?

I am a Cybersecurity Student (Bachelor) and an Operational Reservist in the French Navy. Currently focusing on Red Teaming, Active Directory Exploitation, and Binary Analysis.

This documentation serves as my "Digital Brain" where I store my research, write-ups, and attack methodologies.

docs.title: 🚀 Current Focus
docs.text:
I am currently deep-diving into the Certified Red Team Analyst (CRTA) by CyberWarFare Labs. My goal is to master the entire Kill Chain, from external reconnaissance to Domain Admin compromise.

Latest Learning

Binary Exploitation: Completed the HackTheBox path involving Buffer Overflows, ROP Chains, and GDB analysis. Read the Write-up here

docs.title: 📂 Explore my Notes
docs.text: Section Content 💥 Writeups Detailed solutions for CTF machines (HTB, Root-Me) and real-world scenarios. 🛡️ Cheatsheets My personal commands for AD, PowerShell, Linux, and Evasion. 🎓 Certifications Study notes and reviews of my certifications (eJPT, CRTA...).

docs.title: 📫 Connect with Me
docs.text:
• GitHub: github.com/ton-pseudo

Philosophy

"The only way to truly secure a system is to understand how to break it."

docs.title: Kerberoasting
docs.text: C'est une attaque sur les Service Accounts...

docs.title: Markdown Cheat Sheet (MkDocs)
docs.text: Cette page est ton antisèche. Copie le code pour l'utiliser dans tes write-ups.

docs.title: Ce que tu veux obtenir :
docs.text:
Note

Ceci est une note simple.

Validé

Ceci est un succès.

Critique

Attention danger.

docs.title: Le code à copier :
docs.text:
!!! note "Titre"
    Ton texte ici (4 espaces au début).

!!! success "Succès"
    Bravo.

!!! danger "Attention"
    Danger.

docs.title: Le code à copier :
docs.text:
```python
import os
print("Hello World")
(Remplace python par powershell, bash, html, etc.)
